channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: They're Breaking Every Retirement Rule to Be Off Now, Not Later
item.description: Some workers want to spread retirement throughout their careers, even if it means a smaller 401(k).

item.title: Home buyers wade back into housing market as mortgage rates fall for fifth week in a row
item.description: Mortgage applications rose 1.6% in the last week, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

item.title: Fears of Economic Slowdown Spark Stock-Market Selloff
item.description: The Dow industrials slid more than 600 points and the Nasdaq Composite shed 3.3%.

item.title: U.S. Steel may be forced to leave Pittsburgh if Nippon deal gets scrapped: WSJ
item.description: Chief Executive David Burritt says U.S. Steel needs $3 billion in upgrades to compete.

item.title: In Retirement, There's Finally Time to Cherish the Past
item.description: A trip to a childhood home. Boxes of old letters. A storage room filled with artificats from long ago. The memories they evoke have never felt so dear...

item.title: Hormel Foods’ earnings dinged by continued pressure on whole-bird turkey prices
item.description: Austin, Minn.-based Hormel has been beset by lower prices for whole bird turkeys this year, as well as a production interruption at a Planters facilit...

item.title: China Needs More Factory Robots. Can It Build Its Own?
item.description: Local production of industrial robots is rising, but Japanese and European makers still have a role.

item.title: Company blames ‘forced sale’ for wipeout that saw 98% share-price dive
item.description: The Hong Kong listed company saw its stock price slump 98% on Tuesday. Sanergy Group shares have now increased 78% after the Chinese company said a ‘f...

item.title: Americans Are Really, Really Bullish on Stocks
item.description: The surging stock market has minted millionaires and helped send many Americans’ net worth sharply higher. Many are betting that the rally has more ro...

item.title: In an increasingly manic market, this slow-and-steady fund has broken out
item.description: A fund focusing on low volatility stocks actually recorded a record high.
